  • Sound Card: N/A

requirements_en.minimum:
• Supported OS: Windows®, 2000/XP
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.9 GHz or AMD Athlon™ XP 1900 or higher
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB Hardware T&L-compatible video card*
  • DirectX Version: version 9.0c (included) or higher
  • Sound: DirectX® version 9.0c-compatible sound card
  • Hard Drive: 4 GB free
*Video cards that do not have hardware shader support, such as the GeForce 4 MX or any Intel Integrated graphics, are not supported.
